/* CompanyMapper.ListCompany */
SELECT C.COMPANY_ID, C.CORPORATE_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME, C.REGISTRATION_NO, C.DELETE_YN FROM HM_COMPANY C WHERE C.DELETE_YN = @DeleteYn
AND ( C.CORPORATE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', @CompanyName, '%') OR C.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', @CompanyName, '%') )
AND C.REGISTRATION_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', @RegistrationNo, '%')
ORDER BY C.CORPORATE_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME

/* CompanyMapper.CountCompany */
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HM_COMPANY C WHERE 1=1
AND C.COMPANY_ID = @CompanyId
AND C.REGISTRATION_NO = @RegistrationNo
